en.email_already_exist: There already is an account associated with this email
en.email_already_verified: This email is already verified you can proceed with login
en.role_not_exist: The role you are trying to signup doesn't premitted to register on ReckDeck

en.user_not_approved: Your account's approval is in pending from admin. Please try some moments later
en.verification_email_sent: Your account has been sent a verification email. Please click the link in the email to continue
en.reset_email_sent: A reset password email has been sent to your account. Please click the link in the email to continue
